mapper.select: select di.*, doc.*, us.* from diagnosis di, doctor doc, user us where di.pharmacy_number = #{pharmacy_number} and di.doctor_number = doc.doctor_number and di.user_number = us.user_number order by di.create_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into `pharmacy`(pharmacy_email, pharmacy_password, pharmacy_mobile, pharmacy_business, pharmacy_name, pharmacy_institution, pharmacy_phone, zip_code, street_address, detail_address) values (#{pharmacy_email}, #{pharmacy_password}, #{pharmacy_mobile}, #{pharmacy_business}, #{pharmacy_name}, #{pharmacy_institution}, #{pharmacy_phone}, #{zip_code}, #{street_address}, #{detail_address})
